snippet.title: Amanda the Adventurer - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Amanda the Adventurer is a found footage cartoon-style horror game where players play as Riley Park, who inherits their Aunt Kate’s house following her death. Starting with the seemingly banal task of digging through their reclusive aunt Kate’s attic, Riley comes across multiple VHS tapes. Upon watching said VHS tapes she realizes the people in the tapes are able to communicate with her. Discover animated tapes that tell a progressively more unsettling story. Use wits to think outside the box to uncover secret VHS tapes and unlock new narrative paths that lead to different endings. Amanda the Adventurer is available now on PC.

#AmandaTheAdventurer #HorrorGaming
